wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Sir (Cecil) Lothian Nicholson  (1 November 1865 – 3 March 1933) was a British Army officer.

response: His children included General Sir Cecil Lothian Nicholson, who commanded a division in the First World War, and Admiral Sir Douglas Romilly Lothian Nicholson, who commanded several battle squadrons in the First World War.
*Col. Cecil Lothian Nicholson, East Lancashire Regiment
